snippet.title: Official Reveal Trailer | Ascenders
snippet.description:
Take a first look at the world of Ascenders, an upcoming sci-fantasy action adventure RPG from crypto-native developer Legendary Foundry Games. Ascenders is an open world experience with a fully decentralized, player driven economy powered by Avalanche blockchain.

Scheduled for release in Q1 2024.

Discord: https://discord.com/ascenders
Twitter.com: https://twitter.com/PlayAscenders
